text.div:
conditionRequesterfamilySearchParameter

Parameter requester.family:string

Searches for condition based on the Practitioner's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?requester:Practitioner.family={familyName}

ResourceCondition
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesCondition
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: conditionRequesterfamilySearchParameter
description: Searches for condition based on the Practitioner's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?requester:Practitioner.family={familyName}
